I want to defeat that Galtia.\""},{"lineNumber":43183,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっくり毒で仕留めたいのだが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want to quickly finish it off with poison,\""},{"lineNumber":43184,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにか物凄い毒を知らないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you know of any incredibly strong poison?\""},{"lineNumber":43185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっと……あるよ。ムシ使いでも効く毒」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... yes. A poison that even insect tamers can't resist.\""},{"lineNumber":43186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お。なんだカロリア」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh. What's that, Karoria?\""},{"lineNumber":43187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ムシ使いでも、危ないから近寄っちゃだめだよって","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even insect tamers were told it's dangerous, so they shouldn't get close,\""},{"lineNumber":43188,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言われた、谷があるの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"there's a valley where they were warned like that.\""},{"lineNumber":43189,"originalJapaneseLine":"『カロリア！　あ、あそこに行くのか！』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Karoria! Ah, are you going there!?'"},{"lineNumber":43190,"originalJapaneseLine":"『危ないわよー、カロリアちゃーん』","translatedEnglishLine":"'It's dangerous, Karoria-chan!'"},{"lineNumber":43191,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、ごめんね、みんな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, sorry everyone...\""},{"lineNumber":43192,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも、必要だと思うの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But I think it's necessary.\""},{"lineNumber":43193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、そこに毒があるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, is there poison there?\""},{"lineNumber":43194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん。ムシ使いの薬でも治せない毒のこと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. I've heard of poison that even insect tamers' medicine can't cure.\""},{"lineNumber":43195,"originalJapaneseLine":"　聞いた事あるの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've heard about it.\""},{"lineNumber":43196,"originalJapaneseLine":"「上手く手に入れられればいいんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It would be great if we could get it smoothly...\""},{"lineNumber":43197,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう……なんかすごそうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh... sounds pretty amazing.\""},{"lineNumber":43198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいはーい☆","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes☆"},{"lineNumber":43199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういうのならちぬも知ってまーす」","translatedEnglishLine":"If it's something like that, Chinu also knows.\""},{"lineNumber":43200,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、あるのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, you do have it?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう、儂様じゃないとねー♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, yeah, it has to be me♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「体内の異物も排除するのね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You also eliminate foreign objects inside the body..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこで。コイツの出番だ」
「おっ、出番じゃな。
ぐふふふ、魔人斬っちゃるわーい！」
「こいつの破片を食い物に混ぜる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mix fragments of this into the food."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無敵結界はそれで破れるだろう。
あとはすごい毒できっちり毒殺すれば万事解決だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, with some powerful poison, properly poison it to death and everything will be solved."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なるほど……まあ、筋は通ってる気がするな。
正面から決戦する前に試す価値はありそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Before facing it head-on in a decisive battle, it's worth trying."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、ちょっ、あのっ」
「その、すごい毒というのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That, the powerful poison you mentioned is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはこれから用意する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will prepare that from now on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毒のスペシャリストを集めるぞ。
早うしで毛利のちぬちゃんを呼んでこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Quickly, go and bring Chinu-chan from Mouri."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、すぐに」
「えっ……わし……わし、削られるのーー……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh... I... I'm going to be cut downーー...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テント内に、魔剣の悲痛な叫びがこだました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the tent, the demon sword's painful scream echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて。集まったな。
毒のスペシャリスト会議だ」
「うん」
「はいはーい、お任せ☆」
「まあ……忍者的な、通り一遍の知識だけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... It's just the usual ninja-type knowledge though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「薬物の類は専門外なんだがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Poisons and drugs aren't really my specialty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんで私まで呼ばれてるんですかー！」
「香ちゃん、才能あるよ☆」
「なんのですか！？」
「さて……あのガルティアを倒したい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then... I want to defeat that Galtia."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっくり毒で仕留めたいのだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to quickly finish it off with poison,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか物凄い毒を知らないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you know of any incredibly strong poison?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっと……あるよ。ムシ使いでも効く毒」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... yes. A poison that even insect tamers can't resist."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お。なんだカロリア」
「ムシ使いでも、危ないから近寄っちゃだめだよって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even insect tamers were told it's dangerous, so they shouldn't get close,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言われた、谷があるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "there's a valley where they were warned like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『カロリア！　あ、あそこに行くのか！』
『危ないわよー、カロリアちゃーん』
「うん、ごめんね、みんな……
でも、必要だと思うの」
「で、そこに毒があるのか？」
「うん。ムシ使いの薬でも治せない毒のこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. I've heard of poison that even insect tamers' medicine can't cure."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いた事あるの」
「上手く手に入れられればいいんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It would be great if we could get it smoothly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう……なんかすごそうだな」
「はいはーい☆
そういうのならちぬも知ってまーす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's something like that, Chinu also knows."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、あるのか」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
